items.sentence: If I\'d known Tom was in Boston, I\'d have told you.
I expect Tom will be seeing Mary again this evening.
I think Tom would\'ve helped us if he\'d been there.
It happened three days after I got back from Boston.
I wish that there were something I could do to help.
Home is the place we love best and grumble the most.
Tom didn\'t seem to care that Mary didn\'t like him.
I can\'t imagine myself living in a place like this.
I saw Tom walking in the park with Mary last Monday.
Tom has agreed to babysit our children this evening.
Tom told Mary that he\'d help her with her homework.
I know that you were romantically involved with Tom.
I thought that Tom and Mary handled themselves well.
If you value your liberty, you have to fight for it.
Tom didn\'t think I\'d notice that he wasn\'t there.
It won\'t be long before you get used to doing this.
I\'m not even going to try talk Tom into doing that.
I\'m not even going to try talk Tom into helping us.
I couldn\'t help laughing when I saw Tom doing that.
Tom was a history teacher before he became a lawyer.
